items.output:
IZINA RY’INDWARA: Anemia (Kugabanuka k’amaraso)

IBISOBANURO:
Anemia ni uko umubiri ugira amaraso make (hemoglobine iri hasi), bigatuma umwuka mwiza (oxygen) utarinda kugera ku turemangingo uko bikwiye.

IBIMENYETSO BY’INGENZI:
- Umunaniro, gucika intege, umutima gukomanga vuba
- Kuzenguruka umutwe, guhuma amaso, kubura umwuka
- Uruhu rwera cyangwa rwirabura, inzara zoroshye zikavunika
- Ku bagore: imyenda y’ukwezi myinshi

IBYO GUKORA NONAHA:
- Kurya indyo ibonekamo ibyuma (fer): amahembe, ibishyimbo, isombe, imboga zifite icyatsi
- Kunywa fer na folic acid niba muganga yabitegetse
- Kwitwararika ku myanda y’imibu no ku bindi byatera kuva

RYARI KWIHUTIRA KWA MUGANGA:
- Guhumeka bigoye, kubura umwuka
- Umutima gukomanga cyane, kizungera kidasanzwe
- Kuvira cyane cyangwa anemia ukeka ko yatewe n’amaraso ari kuva

ICYITONDERWA:
Ibisubizo ni rusange. Kuboneza imirire, gusuzumwa kwa muganga no gukurikirana hemoglobine birakenewe.

IZINA RY’INDWARA: Asthma (Guhumeka bigoranye bitewe n’imiyoyo y’imiyungirizo y’uruhu rwo mu bihaha)

IBISOBANURO:
Asthma iterwa n’uko imiyungirizo y’uruhu rwo mu bihaha yifunga igakazwa, igatera wheezing (gukoma nka filimbi), inkorora, no kubura umwuka.

IBIMENYETSO BY’INGENZI:
- Guhumeka bigoranye, gucika intege vuba
- Inkorora y’umugoroba cyangwa mu gitondo
- Ijwi rimeze nka filimbi mu bihaha (wheezing)

IBYO GUKORA NONAHA:
- Gukoresha inhaler ya salbutamol (blue) uko muganga yabyanditse
- Kwicara neza, gufungura imyenda igufashe
- Kwihutira kure y’imyuka yangiza (itabi, ivumbi)

RYARI KWIHUTIRA KWA MUGANGA:
- Nta mpinduka nyuma yo gukoresha inhaler
- Kubura umwuka bikabije, kuvuga bigoye
- Umwana utembera amabere ahumeka

ICYITONDERWA:
Jya ugira “asthma action plan” wandikiwe na muganga, kandi wirinde triggers.

IZINA RY’INDWARA: Pneumonia (Igihe ibihaha byafashwe n’udukoko)

IBISOBANURO:
Ni kwandura kw’ibihaha guterwa na bagiteri cyangwa virus, bigatera umuriro, inkorora n’ububabare mu gituza.

IBIMENYETSO BY’INGENZI:
- Umuriro, inkorora ifite amacandwe
- Kubabara mu gituza, guhumeka vuba
- Kunanuka no kutarya neza (ku bana)

IBYO GUKORA NONAHA:
- Kunywa amazi ahagije, kuruhuka
- Paracetamol ku muriro no ku bubabare
- Gushaka muganga ku buryo bwihuse

RYARI KWIHUTIRA KWA MUGANGA:
- Guhumeka bigoye, imbaraga nke
- Umuriro udatuye, umwana atarya na gato
- Uburibwe bukabije mu gituza

ICYITONDERWA:
Antibiotique zifatwa ku mabwiriza ya muganga; irinde kwihaha itabi.

IZINA RY’INDWARA: Malariya

IBISOBANURO:
Malariya iterwa n’agakoko ka plasmodium gatwarwa n’imibu y’inkwakuzi; itera umuriro uzamuka ugasubira hasi, amavunane n’umutwe.

IBIMENYETSO BY’INGENZI:
- Umuriro, kuribwa umutwe, amavunane
- Kureremba, kurira mu nda, kubabara imitsi
- Kureka kurya (ku bana)

IBYO GUKORA NONAHA:
- Gusuzumisha Rapid Test/Smear niba bishoboka
- Gutangira imiti ya malariya byanditswe na muganga
- Kunywa amazi no kuruhuka

RYARI KWIHUTIRA KWA MUGANGA:
- Gucanganyuka, kutabasha kunywa cyangwa kurya
- Kubabara umutwe bikomeye, umusonga
- Umwana muto ufite umuriro udatuza

ICYITONDERWA:
Irinde imibu ukoresheje inzitiramibu, gusukura aho ikwirira.

IZINA RY’INDWARA: Hypertension (Umuvuduko w’amaraso uri hejuru)

IBISOBANURO:
Ni igihe igipimo cy’umuvuduko w’amaraso gihora kiri hejuru, kigatera ibyago byo kurwara umutima, stroke n’impyiko.

IBIMENYETSO BY’INGENZI (akenshi ntibagaragara):
- Kubabara umutwe, kizungera
- Kureba kabiri, gucika intege

IBYO GUKORA NONAHA:
- Gupima umuvuduko kenshi
- Kugabanya umunyu, kunanura umubiri, imyitozo
- Gukurikiza imiti ya muganga

RYARI KWIHUTIRA KWA MUGANGA:
- Umuvuduko uri hejuru cyane >180/120 hamwe n’umutwe ukomeye, kubabara mu gituza, guhumeka bigoye

ICYITONDERWA:
Kwivuza neza no guhindura imibereho by’igihe kirekire birinda ingaruka.

IZINA RY’INDWARA: Diyabete (Isukari mu maraso iri hejuru)

IBISOBANURO:
Diyabete ni uko isukari mu maraso izamuka kubera kubura cyangwa kudakora kwa insuline.

IBIMENYETSO BY’INGENZI:
- Inyota nyinshi, kujya ku musarane kenshi
- Kunanuka utabishaka, umunaniro
- Kubona nabi, ibisebe bikira buhoro

IBYO GUKORA NONAHA:
- Kugenzura isukari niba ufite akuma
- Kwihutira kwa muganga niba isukari iri hejuru cyane cyangwa uri kuruka
- Gukurikiza indyo ikwiye n’imyitozo

RYARI KWIHUTIRA KWA MUGANGA:
- Gucanganyuka, kubura umwuka, isukari ya “HI” ku bipimo
- Ababyeyi batwite bafite isukari iri hejuru

ICYITONDERWA:
Imiti na lifestyle byanditswe na muganga ni byo by’ingenzi mu gukomeza kugenzura.

IZINA RY’INDWARA: UTI (Ukwandura mu miyoboro y’inkari)

IBISOBANURO:
Ni kwandura kwa bagiteri mu miyoboro y’inkari: kubabara iyo wihagije, kwihagarika kenshi, inkari zifite umunuko.

IBIMENYETSO BY’INGENZI:
- Kubabara no gukoma mu nda y’uko hasi
- Inkari zifite amaraso cyangwa zisa neza

IBYO GUKORA NONAHA:
- Kunywa amazi menshi
- Kwihutira kubona muganga ku rurondogoro n’uvugurura

RYARI KWIHUTIRA KWA MUGANGA:
- Umuriro, kubabara mu rubavu, gutengurwa
- UTI yibasiye umwana muto cyangwa umugore utwite

ICYITONDERWA:
Kurangiza imiti yose uko byanditswe; isuku ni ingenzi.

IZINA: Ibirango by’akaga mu gusama/kwibaruka

IBISOBANURO:
Ni ibimenyetso byerekana ko umubyeyi utwite akeneye ubufasha bwihuse.

IBIMENYETSO:
- Kuvira cyangwa amazi ava mu gitsina
- Kubabara inda bikabije, umwana kutiyambura
- Umutwe ukabije, kureba ibizenga, intoranya mu maboko/amaguru

IBYO GUKORA NONAHA:
- Kwihutira kwa muganga cyangwa ku kigo nderabuzima
- Kudafata imiti utabwiwe

ICYITONDERWA:
Jya ukora ANC uko bigenwa, kurya indyo yuzuye no kuruhuka.

IZINA: Umwuma n’impiswi

IBISOBANURO:
Umwuma utera kubura amazi n’imyunyu; impiswi ituma bitakara vuba, cyane ku bana.

IBIMENYETSO:
- Umunwa wumye, kubura inkari, izuru ryaguye (ku bana), ijisho riretse
- Gucika intege

IBYO GUKORA NONAHA:
- Kunywa ORS gahoro gahoro, Zinc ku bana
- Kwihutira kwa muganga niba impiswi ifite amaraso, umwana atanywa

ICYITONDERWA:
Isuku y’amazi n’intoki irinda; irinde imiti idasobanutse.

IZINA: COVID-19

IBISOBANURO:
Indwara yandurira mu myanya y’ubuhumekero iterwa na SARS-CoV-2.

IBIMENYETSO:
- Umuriro, inkorora, guhumeka bigoye
- Kubura uburyohe/impumuro, umunaniro

IBYO GUKORA NONAHA:
- Gupima, kuruhuka, kunywa amazi, paracetamol
- Gushyira intera, kwambara agapfukamunwa uko bikwiye

RYARI KWIHUTIRA:
- Guhumeka bigoye, igitutu cyo mu bihaha kiri hasi (SpO2 < 92% niba upima)

ICYITONDERWA:
Urukingo n’isuku birinda; kumvira inama za serivisi z’ubuzima.

IZINA: Igituntu (TB)

IBISOBANURO:
Indwara iterwa na Mycobacterium tuberculosis, akenshi mu bihaha.

IBIMENYETSO:
- Inkorora irengeje ibyumweru 2, amaraso mu macandwe
- Umuriro nijoro, kurara ushyushye, kunanuka

IBYO GUKORA NONAHA:
- Kwihutira kwa muganga ku bipimo (GeneXpert)
- Kuvurwa ku buntu mu bigo byihariye

ICYITONDERWA:
Kurangiza imiti yose; kurinda abandi kwandura.

IZINA: HIV (Amakuru y’ibanze)

IBISOBANURO:
HIV yangiza ubudahangarwa; ishobora kuvurwa neza n’imiti ya buri munsi (ART).

IBIMENYETSO BY’IBANZE:
- Umunaniro, umuriro ugaruka, indwara zifata kenshi

IBYO GUKORA:
- Kwipimisha; kwinjira mu burere bwa ART niba byagaragaye
- Kunywa imiti buri munsi ku gihe, guhabwa inama z’imibereho

ICYITONDERWA:
HIV ntivura, ariko iragengwa; kubahiriza imiti ni ingenzi.

Indwara: Tifwayi (Typhoid)
Ibisobanuro: ...

Indwara: Hepatite
Ibisobanuro: ...

Indwara: Stroke
Ibisobanuro: ...

Indwara: Heart Failure
Ibisobanuro: ...

Indwara: Kidney Failure
Ibisobanuro: ...

IZINA RY’INDWARA
Asthma (Umwamuka)

IBISOBANURO MU MAGAMBO MAGUFI
Asthma ni indwara yo mu myanya y’erinera (bronchi) irangwa no gukomereka no kwiyongera k’umusokoro, bigatera guhumeka nabi no gucika intege. Igaruka (recurrent) kandi ishobora gukomera mu bihe bimwe (exacerbations).

IBIMENYETSO BY’INGENZI
- Guhumeka bigoranye, cyane cyane nijoro cyangwa mugitondo
- Inkorora yongera igabanuke, rimwe na rimwe ifite umwuka w’umusokoro
- Gukomangirwa mu gituza, gucika intege vuba
- Wheeze (ijwi ryo kuziriza mu bihaha)

IBYO KWITONDERA (RED FLAGS — HAMAGARA UBUFASHA BW’IHUTIRWA)
- Guhumeka guke cyane n’ijwi rito, amaguru cyangwa iminwa biba ubururu
- Saturation (SpO2) < 90%, cyangwa Peak Flow < 33% y’icyitegererezo
- Kudashobora kuvuga interuro ndende
- Kutakenera ibikoresho byo mu rugo (inhaler) keretse ubufasha bwihuse bubonetse

IVURWA RY’IBANZE MU RUGO
- Ifunguro ririmo amazi menshi, kwirinda umwuka uhumanya n’itabi
- Gukoresha salbutamol inhaler (2–4 puffs, gusubiramo mu minota 20 niba bikenewe)
- Kumenya ibitera (allergens, umunuko, imyitozo ikabije) no kubyirinda

IVURWA RY’UMWUGA (MU KIGO N’UBUVUZI)
- Salbutamol nebulization cyangwa metered-dose inhaler + spacer
- Imiti igabanya urwuma (prednisolone PO cyangwa hydrocortisone IV, bitewe n’uburemere)
- Imiti irinda ibihe (inhaled corticosteroids, +/- LABA)
- Oxygene niba SpO2 iri hasi, kugenzura Peak Flow
- Kwiga ku buryo bwo gukoresha inhaler neza

KWIYIRINDA
- Kwirinda itabi n’umwotsi, gucunga allergens (umukungugu, ivumbi, imiti isharira)
- Gukoresha imiti yo kurinda uko yanditswe, kugenzura buri kwezi/igihe

IMYITWARIRE Y’UMUJYANAMA W’UBUZIMA
- Baza ibihe byiyongera, uko akoresha inhaler, mufashe kubika “asthma action plan”
- Muremeshe ko ashobora kubaho neza iyo akurikiranye neza imiti

INKOMOKO Y’AMAKURU
UCG Rwanda 2023, Chapter 18 (Respiratory) — ihuriro risanzwe mu buvuzi bw’ibanze.

IZINA RY’INDWARA
Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD)

IBISOBANURO
COPD ni indwara y’igihe kirekire igira ingaruka ku myanya y’ubuhumekero, itera kugabanuka kudasubira k’umwuka winjira/usohoka, akenshi iterwa n’itabi cyangwa umwuka uhumanya igihe kirekire.

IBIMENYETSO
- Kuzirika mu gituza no guhumeka bigoranye buhoraho
- Inkorora y’igihe kirekire, akenshi ifite umusokoro
- Guhora unanirwa, kwiyongera kwa episodes (exacerbations)

RED FLAGS
- Hypoxia (SpO2 < 90%), cyanosis, gucika intege bikomeye
- Guhumeka guke cyane, confusion
- Suspected pneumonia/heart failure bifatanyije

IVURWA RY’IBANZE
- Kureka itabi byihutirwa
- Inhalers: bronchodilators (salbutamol), anticholinergics
- Imyitozo yo kongera imbaraga (pulmonary rehab), inama z’indyo

IVURWA RY’UMWUGA
- Nebulization, corticosteroids mu gihe cyiyongereye (exacerbation)
- Antibiotics niba hari ibimenyetso by’iyongera ry’umusokoro/infekisiyo
- Oxygene kuri hypoxia, kugenzura co-morbidities

KWIYIRINDA
- Guhagarika itabi, ikoreshwa ry’agapfukamunwa ahari umukungugu/imyuka
- Gupimwa buri gihe, gukurikiza imiti neza

UMUJYANAMA W’UBUZIMA
- Fasha ku nzira zo guhagarika itabi, supervisions y’imiti, gahunda yo kwitoza guhumeka neza

INKOMOKO
UCG Rwanda 2023, Chapter 19.

IZINA RY’INDWARA
Tuberculosis (Igituntu)

IBISOBANURO
TB ni infekisiyo iterwa na Mycobacterium tuberculosis, ikaba ifata cyane ibihaha ariko ishobora no gufata ibindi bice by’umubiri. Yandura mu mwuka igihe cyinshi.

IBIMENYETSO
- Inkorora irambye (>2–3 weeks), rimwe na rimwe amaraso
- Umuriro, kubira ibyuya nijoro, kunanuka, igahinda
- Kuribwa mu gituza, guhumeka nabi

RED FLAGS
- Hemoptysis nyinshi, gucika intege bikabije
- Suspected TB meningitis/abdominal TB (ibimenyetso bikomeye)
- Kwandura mu muryango (abana, abafite VIH) — ikurikirane ryihuse

IVURWA RY’IBANZE
- Kwihutira kwipimisha (sputum smear/Xpert MTB/RIF)
- Kwirinda gusangiza ibikoresho byegereye umunwa, kwambara agapfukamunwa

IVURWA RY’UMWUGA
- Gahunda y’imiti (HRZE) hakurikijwe UCG/NTLP protocols
- Gukurikirana adherence, kugenzura imbagara z’umubiri (LFTs) uko bikwiye
- Kwipimisha VIH, gutanga inama ku muryango

KWIYIRINDA
- Gukingira abana (BCG), gukurikiza ingamba zo kwirinda no gusukura aho abantu bateranira
- Gukurikirana abafatanye n’umurwayi

UMUJYANAMA W’UBUZIMA
- Sobanurira umurwayi akamaro ko kurangiza imiti, ingaruka zo kuyihagarika

INKOMOKO
UCG Rwanda 2023, Chapter 20.

IZINA RY’INDWARA
Malaria

IBISOBANURO
Malaria iterwa na Plasmodium, ikwirakwizwa n’umubu w’ingore (Anopheles). Igaragarira mu muriro ugaruka, umunaniro, kuribwa umutwe, no kuribwa mu ngingo.

IBIMENYETSO
- Umuriro ugaruka, kubira ibyuya, kuribwa umutwe
- Kunanuka, isesemi, kuribwa mu ngingo
- Mu bana: kugaragaza umunaniro mwinshi, kutanywa

RED FLAGS
- Severe malaria: coma, convulsions, hypoglycemia, anemia ikabije, icterus
- Umuriro udacogora nubwo imiti yatangiye

IVURWA RY’IBANZE
- Kwipimisha (RDT cyangwa smear) mbere yo gutanga imiti
- Kugumisha amazi, paracetamol ku muriro

IVURWA RY’UMWUGA
- ACT (Artemisinin-based Combination Therapy) ku byoroheje
- Artesunate IV ku byikabije, monitoring y’amasukari n’amaraso
- Gukosora anemia, kugenzura ingaruka

KWIYIRINDA
- Imitego y’uduseke turinda imibu (LLINs), gusukura aho imibu ikurira
- Repellents, kwirinda gusohoka nimugoroba na mu gicuku

UMUJYANAMA W’UBUZIMA
- Sobanurira igipimo, uko imiti ikoreshwa, igihe cyo kugaruka niba bidahindutse

INKOMOKO
UCG Rwanda 2023, Chapter 21.

IZINA RY’INDWARA
HIV/VIH

IBISOBANURO
HIV ni virusi itera SIDA, igahungabanya ubudahangarwa bw’umubiri. Ivurwa neza binyuze mu miti ya ARVs kugira ngo virusi igabanuke kandi ubuzima bugendere neza.

IBIMENYETSO
- Ibinure, umuriro ugaruka, kunanuka, infections zigaruka
- Opportunistic infections (candidiasis, TB, PCP)

RED FLAGS
- Ibimenyetso by’infekisiyo ikaze (pneumonia, meningitis)
- CD4 igabanuka cyane, viral load iri hejuru cyane

IVURWA RY’IBANZE
- Kwipimisha no kumenya uko uhagaze
- Kwandikwa vuba kuri ART nyuma yo gusuzuma (Treat All)

IVURWA RY’UMWUGA
- ART regimen hakurikijwe UCG/PMTCT/Guidelines
- Cotrimoxazole prophylaxis uko bikwiye
- Gukurikirana adherence, counseling, gusuzuma co-infections

KWIYIRINDA
- Condom, gukoresha serivisi z’ubujyanama no kwipimisha kenshi
- PMTCT ku bagore batwite, PrEP ku bafite ibyago byinshi

UMUJYANAMA W’UBUZIMA
- Remeza ko kubaho neza bishoboka ukoresheje ART, shishikariza adherence 95%+

INKOMOKO
UCG Rwanda 2023, Chapter 22.

IZINA RY’INDWARA
Peptic Ulcer Disease (PUD)

IBISOBANURO
PUD ni ibisebe mu gifu/duodenum akenshi bitewe na H. pylori cyangwa ibinini bya NSAIDs. Bitera kuribwa mu nda hejuru, bikiyongera iyo ushonye cyangwa nyuma yo kurya ibiryo bimwe.

IBIMENYETSO
- Kuribwa mu nda (epigastric pain), isesemi, kwiyongera nyuma yo kurya cyangwa mu gicuku
- Rimwe na rimwe: kuzana amaraso, umwijima mu musarane

RED FLAGS
- Hematemesis, melena, gucika intege, hypotension
- Kuribwa gukomeye kudatuza, gukuka kw’igifu (perforation) bikekwa

IVURWA RY’IBANZE
- Kwihutira kwipimisha H. pylori (stool antigen/urea breath test)
- Kwimakaza PPIs, kwirinda NSAIDs, itabi, ibisindisha

IVURWA RY’UMWUGA
- Eradication therapy ya H. pylori (triple/quadruple) nk’uko UCG ibisaba
- Endoscopy ku red flags cyangwa kudakira

KWIYIRINDA
- Kwirinda ibinini byangiza igifu utabivuganye na muganga
- Indyo iboneye, kugabanya ibisindisha

UMUJYANAMA W’UBUZIMA
- Gahunda yo kunywa imiti neza, igihe cyo kugaruka mu ivuriro

INKOMOKO
UCG Rwanda 2023, Chapter 23.

IZINA RY’INDWARA
Appendicitis (Uturibwe tw’inyongera twafashwe)

IBISOBANURO
Ni uruhurirane rw’inkomyi/infekisiyo mu dukoresho twinyongera (appendix) dutera kuribwa mu nda ku ruhande rw’iburyo rw’epigastrium/umbilical bigatembera kuri RIF.

IBIMENYETSO
- Kuribwa mu nda bitangira ku nda hagati bikimukira kuri RIF
- Isesemi, kuruka, umuriro muke, anorexia
- Rebound tenderness

RED FLAGS
- Peritonitis: kuribwa gukabije, rigidity, hypotension
- Sepsis

IVURWA RY’UMWUGA
- Kwihutira kohereza mu buvuzi (surgical) — appendectomy
- Antibiotics mbere na nyuma y'ikora
- NPO, IV fluids, analgesics

KWIYIRINDA
- Nta bwo hari urukingo rudasanzwe; gusaba ubufasha hakiri kare

UMUJYANAMA W’UBUZIMA
- Sobanurira ibimenyetso byo kugaruka mu buvuzi byihuse

INKOMOKO
UCG Rwanda 2023, Chapter 24.

IZINA RY’INDWARA
Low Back Pain

IBISOBANURO
Kuribwa mu nda y’inyuma (lumbosacral area) akenshi bituruka ku misokoro/imyitozo idahwitse, imyanya y’imitsi, arthritis, cyangwa disk issues. Akenshi bikira mu byumweru bike n'ubufasha bworoshye.

IBIMENYETSO
- Kuribwa mu nda y’inyuma, kwiyongera iyo wicaye/uhagaze igihe kirekire
- Rimwe na rimwe: kurengerana mu kuguru (sciatica)

RED FLAGS
- Kunanirwa kugenga ibihaha/imyanda, numbness mu gace k'ukuguru (cauda equina)
- Umuriro, history ya kanseri, trauma ikomeye

IVURWA RY’IBANZE
- Analgesics (paracetamol/NSAIDs niba nta contraindications)
- Imyitozo yo kugorora, kuryama neza, kugabanya imitsi ihahamuka
- Ubujyanama ku mikorere y'akazi n'uko wicaraga/hagaze

IVURWA RY’UMWUGA
- Physiotherapy; imaging niba red flags cyangwa kutakira
- Referral kuri specialist niba bikomeje

KWIYIRINDA
- Ergonomics, imyitozo yoroheje ihoraho, kugabanya ibiro

UMUJYANAMA W’UBUZIMA
- Remeza ko ibimenyetso byinshi bikira, ariko wite ku red flags

INKOMOKO
UCG Rwanda 2023, Chapter 25.

IZINA: Umuvuduko w'amaraso (Hypertension)

IBISOBANURO (mu magambo make):
— Ni ukwiyongera kudasanzwe k'umuvuduko w’amaraso ≥140/90 mmHg (ku bantu bakuru) ku bipimo by’amasaha atandukanye.

IBIMENYETSO BY’INGENZI:
— Akenshi ntibigaragara. Hari igihe habaho umutwe, kuruka, kureba ibihu, gucika intege, kubyimba imirundi (edema).

IBYIHUTIRWA (“RED FLAGS”):
— Umuvuduko mwinshi cyane >180/120 mmHg ufite: kuribwa umutima, guhumeka nabi, kuvunagurika mu maso/ikiganza/cy’akaguru, kuvuga nabi, umutwe ukabije, cyangwa impiswi z’amaraso. Yoherezwa byihuse (emergency).

IBIPIMO BY’INGENZI:
— BP yipimwa neza (gupima inshuro nyinshi), BMI, isukari mu maraso, lipids, umusaruro w’impyiko (creatinine, eGFR), urea, electrolytes, EKG niba bibaye ngombwa, proteinuriya muri urine.

UBURYO BWO KUBUNGABUNGA/IVURWA RUSANGE:
— Guhindura imibereho: kugabanya umunyu, kurya indyo iboneye (imboga, imbuto), kugabanya ibisindisha, kureka itabi, imyitozo 150min/icyumweru, kugabanya ibiro.
— IMITI: thiazide (hydrochlorothiazide), ACE-inhibitors (eg. enalapril), ARB (losartan), calcium-channel blocker (amlodipine), cyangwa kombinasi bitewe n’urwego.
— Intego ya BP: <140/90 ku benshi, <130/80 ku bafite diyabete/indwara z’impyiko (nk’uko muganga yabisuzuma).

ICYO KWITONDERA:
— Kugenzura imiti n’ingaruka (kubura potassium, inkovu y’uruhu, n’ibindi), gusuzuma iyo utwite, n’abana bisaba uburyo butandukanye.
— Ibisubizo bitangwa hano ni rusange; ganiriza muganga wawe wemewe.

IZINA: Kunanirwa k’umutima (Heart Failure)

IBISOBANURO:
— Uko umutima unanirwa gutera neza ngo usukure amaraso mu mubiri. Akenshi biterwa n’umutima wahuye n’imbogamizi (coronary disease, hypertension, cardiomyopathy).

IBIMENYETSO:
— Guhumeka nabi iyo uryamye cyangwa ukoresheje ingufu, kubyimba imirundi, kurakara vuba, umunaniro, kureka gukora imirimo isanzwe.

RED FLAGS:
— Guhumeka nabi cyane, cyanosis, umuvuduko w’amaraso uri hasi cyane, arythmia, cyangwa umusatsi w’amaraso mu makirenge (poor perfusion). Ahandi hoshi ni “pulmonary edema” (gupfundikanya n’inkorora y’amaraso).

IBIPIMO:
— EKG, X-ray y’ igituza, BNP/NT-proBNP (niba biboneka), echo y’umutima, laboratoire (renal function, electrolytes).

IVURWA:
— Diuretics (furosemide) ku kubyimba no guhumeka nabi, ACEI/ARB, beta-blocker (bisoprolol/ carvedilol), aldosterone antagonist (spironolactone), n’inyigisho z’imibereho (umunyu muke, kugenzura amazi).

ICYO KWITONDERA:
— Kwitwararika ku bunyamazi bwinshi, kugenzura ibiro buri munsi, kujya mu igenzura rihoraho.

IZINA: Stroke (CVA)

IBISOBANURO:
— Kwangirika k’udutsi tw’amaraso mu bwonko bitewe no gufungana (ischemic) cyangwa kuruka kw’amaraso (hemorrhagic).

IBIMENYETSO BYIHUSE (FAST):
— F: isura igoramye, A: ukuboko/gutambuka bikagorwa, S: kuvuga bikagora, T: igihe ni ingenzi.
— Umutwe ukabije, kureba ibihu, guhagarika inkari/impiswi, cyangwa kubura ubwenge.

RED FLAGS:
— Ibimenyetso byavuzwe haruguru byatangiriye vuba; ukeneye serivisi z’ubutabazi ako kanya (window yo gutanga trombolysis ni nto).

IBIPIMO:
— CT-scan/ MRI y’ubwonko, glucose yihuse, EKG, laboratoire isanzwe.

IVURWA RUSANGE:
— Ischemic: antiplatelet (aspirin) niba bidahabanye n’ibisubizo bya CT; gucunga umuvuduko w’amaraso; rehabilitation.
— Hemorrhagic: gucunga umuvuduko, neuro-surgery niba bikenewe.
— Kwirinda: kugabanya umuvuduko, isukari, itabi, indyo n’imyitozo, statins ku bakeneye.

ICYO KWITONDERA:
— Kumenya ibimenyetso vuba no kwihutira ubutabazi ni ingenzi.

IZINA: Preeclampsia/Eclampsia

IBISOBANURO:
— Preeclampsia: umuvuduko ukabije ≥140/90 nyuma ya w’icyumweru 20 cy’inda + proteinuriya/ibimenyetso by’impyiko/by’uturemangingo.
— Eclampsia: preeclampsia + k seizures.

IBIMENYETSO:
— Umutwe ukabije, kureba ibihu, kubabara mu nda y’ibumoso hejuru (epigastric/RUQ), kubyimba mu maso n’intoki, ibipimo bya BP byakunze kuzamuka.

RED FLAGS:
— Seizures, BP >160/110, ibimenyetso by’iwangirika ry’impyiko/platelets nkeya. Ubutabazi bwihuse, magnesium sulfate, gucunga BP, no gutegura isohoka ry’umwana bitewe n’urwego.

IBIPIMO:
— BP z’umpuririze, urine protein, creatinine, platelet count, LFTs, ultrasound ya fetusi, non-stress test (niba biboneka).

IVURWA:
— MgSO4 ku kurinda/gukemura seizure, antihypertensives (labetalol, hydralazine), gukurikirana umwana n’umubyeyi; igihe cyo kubyarira gigenwa n’urwego rw’indwara.

ICYO KWITONDERA:
— Igenzura rihoraho mu nda, kumenya ibimenyetso byo kugaruka (postpartum preeclampsia irashoboka).

IZINA: UTI (Urinary Tract Infection)

IBISOBANURO:
— Uburwayi buterwa n’udukoko mu nzira y’inkari (cystitis, pyelonephritis).

IBIMENYETSO:
— Gukomereka mu gihe cy’inkari, kwihuta kujya ku bwiherero, inkari zifite impumuro/kuzimira, umuriro (pyelonephritis: n’umugongo uremereye).

RED FLAGS:
— Umuriro mwinshi, kubabara umugongo hejuru (flank pain), inenge z’impyiko, gutwita.

IBIPIMO:
— Urinalysis (nitrite/leukocyte esterase), urine culture niba biboneka, test y’inkari ku bagore batwite.

IVURWA:
— Cystitis: nitrofurantoin, TMP-SMX (aho ikora), fosfomycin. Pyelonephritis: ciprofloxacin/amoxicillin-clavulanate bitewe n’imimerere; kunywa amazi menshi.

ICYO KWITONDERA:
— Gutwita bisaba imiti yihariye, kurangiza dose, gusuzuma niba igaruka kenshi.

IZINA: Indwara zandurira mu mibonano mpuzabitsina (STIs)

IBISOBANURO:
— Gonorrhea, chlamydia, syphilis, trichomonas, HSV, HPV, n’izindi.

IBIMENYETSO:
— Kuvuvutira/ububabare mu gitsina, kwishimagura, ibisebe, impagarara mu nda (PID).

RED FLAGS:
— Umuriro, kubabara mu nda bikabije, sepsis; ukeneye gutabara vuba.

IBIPIMO:
— Tests zishingiye ku buryo buboneka (NAATs ku GC/CT, RPR/VDRL ku syphilis, wet mount ku trichomonas, HIV test).

IVURWA:
— Gonorrhea: ceftriaxone + doxycycline ku gukingira chlamydia.
— Chlamydia: doxycycline/azithromycin.
— Syphilis: penicillin G.
— PID: kombinasi ya antibiotics. Kwigisha ku kwirinda, gukoresha agakingirizo, no kuvura abo mwaryamanye.

ICYO KWITONDERA:
— Gusubira kwisuzumisha nyuma ya 3 mois kuri bamwe, gutanga inama z’ubuzima bw’imyororokere.

IZINA: Ihungabana n’akababaro k’umutima (Depression/Anxiety)

IBISOBANURO:
— Indwara z’imitekerereze: guhangayika, gucika intege mu byishimo n’imirimo, ibitekerezo byo kwiheba, ubwoba buhoraho.

IBIMENYETSO:
— Kutagira ibyo wishimira, umunaniro, ibitotsi bihinduka, kwigunga, kutiyizera, ibitekerezo byo kwiyahura (emergency).

RED FLAGS:
— Ibitekerezo/intego byo kwiyahura cyangwa kwica undi. Ubutabazi bwihuse, kubonana n’inzobere mu buzima bwo mu mutwe.

IBIPIMO:
— PHQ-9, GAD-7 (niba biboneka), isuzuma ry’imiti n’izindi ndwara zifatanye.

IVURWA:
— Inama n’ubufasha (counseling/CBT), SSRIs/SNRIs ku babikeneye, imyitozo ngororamubiri, guhuza n’itsinda ry’inkunga.

ICYO KWITONDERA:
— Kugira umujyanama w’ubuzima, kwirinda kunywa cyane ibisindisha, kugenzura imiti.

IZINA: Impiswi z’abana n’inyota (Pediatric Diarrhea & Dehydration)

IBISOBANURO:
— Impiswi nyinshi zitera kubura amazi, zishobora guterwa na virus (rotavirus), bacteria, parasites.

IBIMENYETSO:
— Impiswi, kuruka, umunaniro, umunwa wumye, inkari nke, isura yijimye; ku mubyeyi: agasanduku k’inkweto kameze ubusa (diaper dry).

RED FLAGS:
— Ibimenyetso by’inyota ikabije: kubura ubwenge, kutabona umutima neza, impiswi z’amaraso, umuriro mwinshi.

IBIPIMO:
— Gusuzuma urwego rw’inyota (mild/moderate/severe), labor niba bikenewe.

IVURWA:
— ORS (oral rehydration solution) ku manywa kenshi; zinc 10–14days; indyo ikomeza (kugaburira gake gake). IV fluids ku nyota ikabije.

ICYO KWITONDERA:
— Kwirinda: isuku y’amazi, gukaraba intoki, inkingo (rotavirus).

IZINA RY’IGITABO: 34. ASTHMA

A. IBISOBANURO
Asthma ni indwara yo guhumeka iterwa no kwifunga kwa bronchi ku buryo buhindagurika, itera guhekenya (wheezing), gucika umwuka no gukorora cyane, cyane nijoro cyangwa nimugoroba.

B. IBIMENYETSO BY’INGENZI
- Gucika umwuka, guhekenya, gukorora kenshi, kugaruka kw’ibimenyetso. 
- Ibyongera: umukungugu, imibu/inyungu, imbeho, imyitozo, itabi, umunuko ukaze.

C. ISUZUMA
- Anamnesis + isuzuma ry’umubiri (wheezing). 
- SpO2, Peak flow/FEV1 niba bibonetse. 
- Reba ibimenyetso by’ubukana (SpO2<92%, guhindura ibara, kuvuga amagambo make).

D. KUVURA KU RWEGO RWA MBERE
- Icyihutirwa: Salbutamol neb/inhaler (puffs 4–8 q20min ×1h), O2 niba SpO2<94%.
- Igihe cyose: ICS (beclomethasone/budesonide) ku bababara kenshi, salbutamol PRN.
- Gutoza gukoresha inhaler, gutahukana “asthma action plan.”

E. USHAKA UMWUGA NIBA BIKENEWE
- Asthma y’ubukana (cyanosis, SpO2<92%, guhinduka mu mutwe, kutavuga), kutitabara nyuma y’amasaha 1 y’ivuriro ryo hasi, umwana muto cyane.

F. KWIRINDA
- Kwizirika ku mpamvu z’ihembe (dust, itabi), gukingira umwuka, gukingira ibicurane, gukoresha inhaler neza.

G. IBYITONDERWA
- Ibisubizo ni rusange; kugenzurwa na muganga ni ingenzi mu gukwirakwiza urwego rw’ivuriro.

IZINA RY’IGITABO: 35. COPD

A. IBISOBANURO
COPD (Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease) ni indwara y’igihe kirekire yo mu bihaha itera kubura umwuka bitewe n’ihungabana ry’inzira z’ikirere (emphysema/bronchitis).

B. IBIMENYETSO BY’INGENZI
- Kuribwa n’umwuka, gukorora kenshi n’umusemburo, umunaniro wo guhumeka.
- Abashyitsi: abanywa itabi, abakorera mu mwanda/imyuka ihumanya.

C. ISUZUMA
- Anamnesis + auscultation, SpO2. 
- Spirometry niba ibonetse (FEV1/FVC<0.7). 
- R/O asthma, TB, CHF.

D. KUVURA KU RWEGO RWA MBERE
- Itabi: guhagarika burundu. 
- Bronchodilators (SABA/SAMA), ICS+LABA ku barwara kenshi.
- Exacerbation: salbutamol neb, ipratropium, prednisolone 40 mg ×5–7, O2 (88–92%).

E. USHAKA UMWUGA
- SpO2<88% tudatanze O2, cyanosis, umuvuduko w’umutima mwinshi, kutihangana. 

F. KWIRINDA
- Guhagarika itabi, gupfuka akanda, inkingo (flu, pneumococcal), imyitozo.

G. IBYITONDERWA
- Kwitabira gukurikirana kwa muganga no gupimisha spirometry igihe biboneka.

IZINA RY’IGITABO: 36. IGASHA (TUBERCULOSIS)

A. IBISOBANURO
TB ni indwara iterwa na Mycobacterium tuberculosis, ikunze kwibasira ibihaha ariko ishobora no kwibasira ibindi bice.

B. IBIMENYETSO
- Gukorora igihe kirekire (>2 ibyumweru), uburiro, ibyuya nijoro, kunanuka, umuriro uri hasi. 
- Ku mwana: kunanuka, gukorora, ibimenyetso by’umurongo muto w’imbaraga.

C. ISUZUMA
- Sputum smear/Xpert MTB/RIF, X-ray y’ibihaha niba ibonetse, HIV test. 

D. KUVURA KU RWEGO RWA MBERE
- Guhuza umurongo wa gahunda y’igihugu (RHNT): fazi yo guhashya + yo gukurikirana (HRZE…).
- Kwubahiriza amahame ya DOTS, gutoza gufata imiti neza.

E. USHAKA UMWUGA
- Ibimenyetso bikomeye, HIV+, TB yoroheje yananiranye, akabariro (meningeal, m’ogutwi, igifu).

F. KWIRINDA
- Gukingira BCG, gukumira ikwirakwira (mask, umwuka uhagije), gusuzuma abo mubana.

G. IBYITONDERWA
- Imiti ya TB igira ingaruka; kugenzurwa n’urwego rubifitiye ububasha.

IZINA RY’IGITABO: 37. VIH/SIDA

A. IBISOBANURO
VIH ni virusi igabanya ubudahangarwa, ishobora kugera ku cyiciro cya SIDA mu gihe itavuwe neza.

B. IBIMENYETSO BY’INGENZI
- Gukama kw’imbaraga, indwara zagaruka kenshi, indwara zo mu kanwa (oral thrush), ibibyimba.

C. ISUZUMA
- Rapid tests/ELISA, CD4/VL niba bibonetse. 
- Screening zindi: HBV, HCV, syphilis, TB.

D. KUVURA KU RWEGO RWA MBERE
- ART hakurikijwe amabwiriza y’igihugu (TDF/3TC/DTG n’ibindi). 
- Cotrimoxazole prophylaxis aho bikenewe, inkingo zose.

E. USHAKA UMWUGA
- Opportunistic infections zikomeye, kutihanganira imiti, igabanuka rikabije ry’imbaraga.

F. KWIRINDA
- Kondomu, kuboneza urubyaro, kudasangira ibikoresho byandura, gusuzuma igihe.

G. IBYITONDERWA
- Guhabwa inama ku burenganzira n’ubuzima bw’imyitwarire; kurindwa ivangura.

IZINA RY’IGITABO: 38. MALARIA

A. IBISOBANURO
Malaria iterwa na Plasmodium ibinyujije ku mbasa. 

B. IBIMENYETSO
- Umuriro, amacumba, kuribwa umutwe, kuribwa imikaya, isesemi. 
- Iyakomeye: kutiyumvira, kubura icyerekezo, kunanirwa kunywa/kurya, anemia, hypoglycemia.

C. ISUZUMA
- RDT cyangwa smear. 
- Pima glycemia niba ukeka malaria ikaze.

D. KUVURA
- Uncomplicated: ACT (artemether-lumefantrine) hakurikijwe amabwiriza. 
- Ikaze: IV artesunate, O2, rehydration; kohereza ku rwego ruri hejuru.

E. USHAKA UMWUGA
- Malaria ikaze, umwana muto/umugore utwite ufite ibimenyetso bikomeye.

F. KWIRINDA
- Imitego y’inzitiramibu, isuku, kurwanya imibu, kwirinda kujya ahari inzoka nyinshi nijoro.

G. IBYITONDERWA
- Kwubahiriza dose neza; kugenzura ibimenyetso nyuma y’iminsi 2–3.

IZINA RY’IGITABO: 39. TIFOYIDE

A. IBISOBANURO
Typhoid iterwa na Salmonella typhi/Paratyphi; yandurira mu biribwa/ibinyobwa byanduye.

B. IBIMENYETSO
- Umuriro uhora uri hejuru, kuribwa mu nda, isesemi, gucibwamo, rimwe na rimwe kwituma bigoye.
- Hepatosplenomegaly ishobora kuboneka.

C. ISUZUMA
- RDT/IgG/IgM ntizihagije zonyine; hemoculture/stooculture ni yo yizewe niba ibonetse. 
- CBC, LFTs niba bikenewe.

D. KUVURA
- Antibiotique ishingiye ku mabwiriza (ceftriaxone, azithromycin, ciprofloxacin bitewe na resistance y’akarere). 
- Rehydration, antipyretics.

E. USHAKA UMWUGA
- Shock, perforation ikekwa, kubura amazi gukabije, igisubizo kibi ku miti.

F. KWIRINDA
- Isuku y’amazi n’ibiribwa, gukaraba intoki, kubika neza.

G. IBYITONDERWA
- Kumenya resistance y’akarere ni ingenzi mu guhitamo imiti.

IZINA RY’IGITABO: 40. HEPATITIS B/C

A. IBISOBANURO
Hepatitis ni ukwivumbagatanya kwa kavukire k’umwijima, cyane cyane HBV na HCV, bishobora guteza cirrhosis na HCC.

B. IBIMENYETSO
- Umunaniro, urusenda mu nda, jaundice, ibikomere byoroshye, kubabara mu rubavu rw’iburyo.

C. ISUZUMA
- HBsAg, HBeAg, HBV DNA; anti-HCV na HCV RNA; LFTs, US niba bibonetse.

D. KUVURA
- HBV: tenofovir/entecavir ku bisabwa; HCV: DAAs (sofosbuvir/ledipasvir n’ibindi) aho biboneka.
- Kwizirika ku kwirinda inzoga n’imiti yangiza umwijima; inkingo kuri HBV.

E. USHAKA UMWUGA
- Jaundice ikabije, encephalopathy, INR hejuru, ascites, failure y’umwijima.

F. KWIRINDA
- Inkingo HBV, kwirinda gusangira ibikoresho byandura.

G. IBYITONDERWA
- Kumenya stade y’indwara mbere yo gutangira imiti ni ngombwa.

IZINA RY’IGITABO: 41. EPILEPSY

A. IBISOBANURO
Epilepsy ni indwara y’ihungabana ry’imitsi riterwa n’imirabyo y’amashanyarazi mu bwonko, itera ibitero (seizures) byongera.

B. IBIMENYETSO
- Generalized/partial seizures, post-ictal confusion, kugwa, kumira ururimi.

C. ISUZUMA
- Anamnesis (ubwo byatangiye, imyaka, ubwitabire), glucose, electrolytes; EEG/CT/MRI niba bibonetse.

D. KUVURA
- First line: valproate, carbamazepine, lamotrigine bitewe n’ubwoko; kubahiriza dose. 
- Status epilepticus: diazepam/lorazepam IV/rectal; kohereza.

E. USHAKA UMWUGA
- Seizure irambye >5 min, kumurika kenshi, trauma, ku bana bato cyane.

F. KWIRINDA
- Kwirinda gusinzira gake, inzoga nyinshi, ibintu byatera ibitero (umucyo uhishe).

G. IBYITONDERWA
- Gutozwa ibyangombwa byo gutabara mu rugo no kwirinda impanuka mu gihe cy’igitero.

IZINA RY’INDWARA: Umuvuduko w’amaraso uri hejuru (Hypertension)

1) IBISOBANURO
Umuvuduko w’amaraso uri hejuru ni uko umuvuduko (BP) urenga 140/90 mmHg ku nshuro ebyiri cyangwa se 130/80 ku bafite diyabete/uburwayi bw’umutima. Utera ibindi byago: stroke, indwara z’umutima, impyiko.

2) IBIMENYETSO
Akenshi nta bimenyetso. Hari igihe: umutwe, gucika intege, guhumeka nabi iyo hejuru cyane, kubyimbirwa n’ibirenge.

3) ISUZUMA
• Fata BP neza (icupa rikwiye, umuntu yicaye 5 min, kuboko ku mutima). 
• Sura amasuzuma y’ibanze: HbA1c cyangwa fasting glucose, lipids, kreatinine/eGFR, umusemburo mu nkari (proteinurie).
• Reba ibindi byago (itabi, ibiro, imirire, siporo).

4) KUVURA KU RWEGO RWA MBERE
• Guhindura imibereho: kugabanya umunyu, kurya indyo iboneye (DASH), gukora siporo nibura iminota 150/icyumweru, kugabanya ibisindisha, gutakaza 5–10% by’ibiro.
• Imiti (hitamo imwe; wongeraho bitewe n’ibisubizo):
  – Thiazide (hydrochlorothiazide 12.5–25 mg/j)
  – ACE inhibitor (enalapril 5–20 mg/j) cyangwa ARB (losartan 25–100 mg/j)
  – CCB (amlodipine 5–10 mg/j)
• Intego: <140/90 (cyangwa <130/80 ku bafite ibyago byinshi).
• Genza neza imiti n’ingaruka: amacandwe, kubyimba ku biganza/ibirenge, gukorora (ACEI).

5) IGIHE USHAKA UMWUGA
BP ≥180/120 mmHg ifite ibimenyetso (umutwe ukabije, kugoreka ijisho, guhumeka nabi), eGFR igabanutse cyane, proteinurie nyinshi, mutima urembye, inda (preeclampsia).

6) KWIRINDA
Kureka itabi, kugabanya umunyu <5 g/j, siporo, kugabanya stress, gukurikirana BP buri kwezi kugeza igengewe.

7) IBYITONDERWA
Reba imikoranire n’indi miti (NSAIDs byongera BP), wite ku bagore batwite (wirinda ACEI/ARBs).

IZINA RY’INDWARA: Uburwayi bw’umutima bugenza nabi amaraso (Heart Failure)

1) IBISOBANURO
Umutima utakigira imbaraga zo gusunika amaraso neza (systolic) cyangwa warambutse (diastolic).

2) IBIMENYETSO
Kuribwa n’Igituza giterwa n’umunaniro, guhumeka nabi by’umwihariko nijoro, kubyimba ibirenge, kunanuka vuba, kuryama agahinda ko kubura umwuka (orthopnea).

3) ISUZUMA
• Vital signs, BMI, kugenzura shuga na BP.
• BNP/NT-proBNP niba bibashoboka.
• ECG, X-ray y’Igituza: cardiomegaly/pulmonary edema.
• Echocardiography (niba ibonetse) kugira ngo urebe EF.

4) KUVURA KU RWEGO RWA MBERE
• Furosemide 20–40 mg ( kugeza hejuru bitewe n’amazi).
• ACEI (enalapril) cyangwa ARB (losartan) + beta-blocker (carvedilol cyangwa bisoprolol) iyo ashobora kwihangana.
• Aldosterone antagonist (spironolactone) ku bafite EF iri hasi.
• Inama z’imibereho: kugabanya umunyu, kugenzura amazi, kugabanya ibisindisha, siporo yoroheje.

5) IGIHE USHAKA UMWUGA
Guhumeka nabi bikabije, cyanosis, edema ikabije, hypotension, arythmie ikomeye, cyangwa kutihanganira imiti.

6) KWIRINDA
Kugenzura BP, shuga, kureka itabi, gufata imiti neza, kugenzura ibiro.

7) IBYITONDERWA
Witondere amafasha (NSAIDs), gukora monitoring ya kreatinine na K+ ku bafata ACEI/ARB/spironolactone.

IZINA RY’INDWARA: Stroke (Kuvuga cyangwa Kwimuka bigoye bitewe n’amaraso mu bwonko)

1) IBISOBANURO
Kwuzura cyangwa kubura amaraso mu bwonko (ischemic cyangwa hemorrhagic).

2) IBIMENYETSO
FAST: Face (imbabura mu isura), Arm (ikiganza/gitugu kitizerera), Speech (amagambo apfupfu), Time (vugana n’abaganga ako kanya).

3) ISUZUMA
• Vital signs (harimo glycemia yihuta).
• CT scan/MRI niba bibashoboka (gutandukanya ischemic na hemorrhagic).
• Labs: CBC, glucose, lipids, INR.

4) KUVURA KU RWEGO RWA MBERE
• Oneka glycemia (wirinda hypoglycemia/hyperglycemia).
• Aspirin 150–300 mg iminsi ya mbere ku ischemic stroke niba nta hemorrhage.
• BP management ku cyiciro gitunganye (wirinda kugabanya cyane).
• Reba kunyunyuta, imirire, mobilization yoroheje, physiotherapy.

5) IGIHE USHAKA UMWUGA
Igihe cyose utekereza stroke nshyashya, guhumeka nabi, kugabanuka kw’iby’ingenzi, hemorrhage, cyangwa ibimenyetso byiyongera.

6) KWIRINDA
Genzura BP, shuga, lipids, kureka itabi, aspirin/statin uko biteganyijwe.

7) IBYITONDERWA
tPA/Intervention bikeneye ubuvuzi bwisumbuye, reba nka guidelines z’igihugu.

IZINA RY’IGICE: Kwita ku mugore utwite (ANC)

1) IBISOBANURO
Kugenzura ubuzima bw’umugore n’uruhinja, gutahura ibibazo kare, guha inama n’inkingo.

2) IBIMENYETSO
Nta ndwara, ni serivisi isanzwe: kureba ibipimo, anemia, shuga, umuvuduko w’amaraso, indwara zandura.

3) ISUZUMA
• BP buri kugezwa, proteinurie (dipstick), Hb, VCT, RPR, malariya aho bikenewe, umurindi w’umwana (FHR).
• Ultrasound (trimestre ya 1/2 niba ibonetse).

4) KUVURA KU RWEGO RWA MBERE
• IFAS (Iron+Folic), inama ku mirire, indwara zishobora kwirindwa, inkingo (TT), mosquito nets.
• Kwimenyereza kubyarira kwa muganga, gupimisha shuga ku bafite ibyago.

5) IGIHE USHAKA UMWUGA
BP ≥140/90, proteinurie, kubyimba kw’ibirenge n’ibiganza, kubabara igituza/umugongo, kugabanuka kwa FHR, kuribwa mu nda bikomeye, kuva kw’amaraso.

6) KWIRINDA
Kwihutira ANC hakiri kare, indyo nziza, kwirinda itabi/ibiyobyabwenge, gukurikiza gahunda y’inkingo.

7) IBYITONDERWA
Witondere imiti itemewe mu gihe cyo gutwita; jya ureba guideline z’igihugu.

IZINA RY’INDWARA: Preeclampsia/Eclampsia

1) IBISOBANURO
Preeclampsia: BP ≥140/90 nyuma ya wks 20 + proteinurie cyangwa ibimenyetso by’impyiko/umusokoro. Eclampsia: Preeclampsia + kubura ubwenge/ibise (seizures).

2) IBIMENYETSO
Umutwe ukabije, kureba ibyijimye, kuribwa epigastrique, kubyimba mu maso/ibirenge, BP iri hejuru, proteinurie.

3) ISUZUMA
• BP kenshi, dipstick protein, labs: platelets, AST/ALT, kreatinine.
• FHR monitoring, reba gahunda yo kohereza.

4) KUVURA KU RWEGO RWA MBERE
• MgSO4 (loading/maintenance) ku kibazo cya eclampsia/severe preeclampsia.
• Labetalol cyangwa hydralazine kugabanya BP hejuru cyane.
• Gutegura kohereza ku rwego rwo hejuru no gutekereza ku gihe cyo kubyara.

5) IGIHE USHAKA UMWUGA
Byose by’eclampsia/severe preeclampsia bisaba kohereza ako kanya.

6) KWIRINDA
ANC kare, kumenya ibimenyetso by’ingaruka, kugenzura BP.

7) IBYITONDERWA
MgSO4 isabwa kuba ifashwe neza, kurinda aspiration, monitoring y’uruhu/PND/reflexes.

IZINA RY’INDWARA: Postpartum Hemorrhage (PPH) — kuva kwinshi nyuma yo kubyara

1) IBISOBANURO
Kuva >500 ml (vaginal) cyangwa >1000 ml (CS) mu masaha 24 ya mbere.

2) IBIMENYETSO
Kuva kugaragara, hypotension, tachycardia, pallor, gucika intege.

3) ISUZUMA
• Reba impamvu 4 Ts: Tone (uterine atony), Tissue (placenta isigaye), Trauma (imyanya y’igitsina), Thrombin (kwirinda amaraso kudakora).

4) KUVURA KU RWEGO RWA MBERE
• Uterine massage, oxytocin 10 IU IM/IV, misoprostol 800–1000 µg PR, tranexamic acid 1 g IV vuba.
• Gushaka aho amaraso ava, guhagarika ibikomere, fluids IV.

5) IGIHE USHAKA UMWUGA
Iyo kuva gukomeje/kwiyongera, shock, cyangwa bikenewe ibindi bikoresho.

6) KWIRINDA
AMTSL: oxytocin nyuma yo kubyara, traction yoroheje ya umbilical cord, kugenzura placenta yuzuye.

7) IBYITONDERWA
Kuba hafi y’imiti n’amazi, kugenzura vital signs kenshi.

IZINA RY’INDWARA: Neonatal Sepsis (kwandura kwa ruhinja)

1) IBISOBANURO
Ukwandura gukomeye mu minsi 28 ya mbere; Early/late onset.

2) IBIMENYETSO
Kuramba/kuramba gusinzira, guhumeka nabi, gukonja/umuriro, kutanywa neza, cyanosis, convulsions.

3) ISUZUMA
• Vital signs, glucose yihuta.
• CBC, CRP niba bibashoboka, hemoculture, X-ray niba hari respiratory distress.

4) KUVURA KU RWEGO RWA MBERE
• Ampicillin + gentamicin (dose zishingiye ku ibiro/imyaka).
• IV fluids, gushyushya umwana, O2 niba akenewe, kugenzura isukari.

5) IGIHE USHAKA UMWUGA
Guhumeka nabi, convulsions, shock, kutakira neza imiti.

6) KWIRINDA
Isuku mu kubyaza, gukaraba intoki, gukurikiza protocole ya cord care, gukomeza konka.

7) IBYITONDERWA
Kumenya ingaruka za gentamicin (oto-/nephrotoxicity), kugenzura dose.

IZINA RY’INDWARA: Pneumonia mu bana

1) IBISOBANURO
Ukwandura mu bihaha butera guhumeka nabi mu bana (akenshi bacterial/viral).

2) IBIMENYETSO
Inkoni z’umwuka, umwuka wihuta, guhumeka nabi, fevere, inzozi nkeya, cyanosis mu byago bikomeye.

3) ISUZUMA
• IMCI criteria: fast breathing, chest indrawing, danger signs.
• O2 saturation, X-ray niba bibashoboka.

4) KUVURA KU RWEGO RWA MBERE
• Amoxicillin 40–50 mg/kg/dose PO bid 5–7 iminsi ku kidakomeye; azithromycin/alternatives bitewe n’aho mutuye.
• O2 nibiba bikenewe, fluids, ibinini bya fevere.
• Kohereza niba ari “severe” cyangwa hari danger signs.

5) IGIHE USHAKA UMWUGA
Guhumeka nabi cyane, cyanosis, kutanywa, convulsions, sepsis, O2 < 90%.

6) KWIRINDA
Inkingo (PCV, Hib, measles), imirire myiza, isuku, kwirinda umwotsi/itabi.

7) IBYITONDERWA
Kwitondera doses zishingiye ku biro; kureba imikoranire y’imiti.
